Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 72 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
